name: Tri-Colour Gun
description:
This is my submission for "Mini Jam 111"

It is an endless shoot-em-up with three different guns, where you are your worst enemy. You can throw yourself off the map, fry yourself with a laser, or simply shot yourself with one of your own bullets, in this game your death is (mostly) caused by you.

Controls:

A and D - move left and right

W - Jump

Left Shift or Space - Dash (invincibility frames)

Mouse and Left Click - Aim and shoot

(Side note: Finding a style and a way to fit with the limitation was super fun this time, kinda wish I could have spent more time on the game but my job got in the way)
